name: DEMONTRIGGER
description:
DEMON TRIGGER is all about killing demonic creatures in one strike!

Use your mana to perform mighty attacks!

But watch out! Your mana points are limited so you have to carefully think about how you use the different attacks!

Also, the player MUST reach the elevator at the end of each turn!

Features

  • Choose from a collection of skins for the player
  • Different attacks to choose from
  • Discord RPC integration

Controls:

Left / Right click - select / place attacks

Space - Confirm loadout / start attacking

R - Restart Level

Bind the attacks you want to use to the right or left mouse key by clicking on the attack icon. Then press space to confirm your loadout and start placing the selected attacks in the room.

Then press space again to start attacking!

NOTE: This is an experimental project! Everything will / can be changed in the future! Also it is not sure whether this project is being continued. That is also the reason for the lack of content in the game. I am currently working on a custom level builder. Just imagine this being a technical beta test / experiment. 

This is also the reason why there isn't an in-game tutorial right now! Please read the short text below to see all the controls and keybinds used.

Game engine:

Game Maker: Studio 1.4.x

Libraries / Extensions used:
